articles.title: A Revolut mortgage? CEO reveals 'super-app' plans to offer '100pc digital' mortgages - Independent.ie
articles.description: What’s next for Revolut? Can it ever be your only bank? Might it soon offer mortgages? And now that it has introduced messaging services, is it trying to become Europe’s first ‘super app’?
articles.content:
